name: Hexagun
description:
Hexagun is a match3 shooter on the hexagon field.
Clean the playing field by forming groups of three or more like-colored hexagons.
To pass the level you need to collect the right amount of hexagons in a limited time.
The game ends when the hexagons reach the bottom dotted line of the screen.
There are 5 difficulty levels: Basic, Easy, Medium, Hard, Extreme.
The game supports two gameplay modes: classic match3 gameplay and gameplay by different match3 levels.
Enjoy today with great gameplay for everyone!
